features: CONTAINS: One 23.2-ounce tub of infant formula milk-based powder with iron
INFANT IMMUNE SUPPORT: Similar to breast milk, Mama Bear Advantage Baby Formula has the prebiotic 2’-FL HMO for infant immune health and digestion; Compare to Similac PRO-ADVANCE Infant Formula
COMPLETE NUTRITION: Contains nutrients like those found in breast milk, such as DHA (Omega-3), Lutein and Vitamin E, to support growth, brain and eye development
NO ARTIFICIAL GROWTH HORMONES: Dairy ingredients come from cows raised with no artificial growth hormones; ingredients are non GMO and gluten free; Certified Kosher by the Orthodox Union - (U)
FDA STANDARDS: Like all infant formulas sold in the US, Mama Bear Advantage Baby Formula Powder with Iron meets FDA standards, the same as the national brand; Compare and save
VITAMINS AND MINERALS: The first year is a time of rapid change for your little one; Mama Bear Advantage Milk-Based Baby Formula Powder with Iron contains 27 vitamins

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Q&A QUESTION: Is Mama Bear an Amazon private-label brand and does Amazon make the products? ANSWER: Yes, Mama Bear Infant Formulas are owned and distributed by Amazon. Amazon works directly with a supplier—a leading infant formula company—to manufacture Mama Bear Infant Formulas. QUESTION: Where are Mama Bear Infant Formulas made? ANSWER: All Mama Bear Infant Formulas are produced in Vermont and Ohio, U.S.A. Our dairy ingredients are sourced from one of the leading dairy markets, including the United States, Canada, and New Zealand. QUESTION: Are infant formulas regulated for quality and safety? ANSWER: Infant formulas are strictly regulated by the FDA to ensure product quality and safety. All infant formulas, by law, must meet or exceed the standards set by the FDA. QUESTION: What nutrients are included in infant formulas and what do they do? ANSWER: All infant formulas sold in the United States must provide complete nutrition for your baby’s first year of life, including protein, carbohydrates, fat, and appropriate vitamins and minerals. Infant formulas are patterned after breast milk. QUESTION: What’s new with Mama Bear infant formula? ANSWER: Mama Bear Infant Formulas contain the latest innovations in infant nutrition, including DHA, choline, lutein, nucleotides, prebiotics and probiotics. These include ingredients that are present in formulas because they occur naturally in breast milk.

Advantage Premium Infant Sensitivity Gentle Organic Soy Compare To Similac PRO-ADVANCE Enfamil Infant Similac Pro-Sensitive Enfamil Gentlease Similac Organic Similac Soy Isomil and Enfamil ProSobee Description complete nutrition designed to be more like breastmilk complete nutrition that's closer to breastmilk (than our previous formulation) complete nutrition for babies with fussiness & gas when sensitive to lactose complete nutrition with easy to digest proteins for fussiness, gas & crying complete nutrition made with organic milk complete nutrition in soy-based based formula Milk-Based ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ 99% Reduced Lactose (compared to our standard milk formula) ✓ Lactose Free ✓ Partially Broken Down Proteins ✓ Organic ✓ 2'FL HMO Prebiotic for Immune Support ✓ ✓ No Artificial Growth Hormones ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ NA Non-GMO ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Name brand quality
reviews.reviewText: My son would throw up any generic Similac except for this one! So strange but that’s kids for ya. Definitely will buy this one for my future

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great formula and best jar design
reviews.reviewText: The formula is functionally equivalent to similac advanced pro. Our baby loves it and has great bowel movement having this. The jar design is the best ever on earth—love the scoop holder that allows the scoop facing upside down, so there is no more powder residue!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My baby didn't have any issues with this formula. It also stirs well and doesn't clump.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly like Similac Advance Pro, but cheaper!
reviews.reviewText: Our baby had no issues switching to this. With the formula shortage, there has been an issue finding any at all, let alone the kind our baby actually needs. It was amazing to find this available, as I had no idea the brand even existed. The storage container and placeholder for the scoop are wonderful and keep the formula very fresh. We are incredibly happy with this purchase, and, most importantly, our baby is, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Same as well known brands
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit skeptical about Mama Bear, since it a new brand, but decided to give it a try. The formula arrived is an easy to open box, with a leveling corner and neat place to store the scoop.My baby loves it, no issues there. The only minus is that it seems to be a bit harder to mix than the Similac ones

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby liked it
reviews.reviewText: Baby who is lactose sensitive and can usually only drink Soy, had no tummy issues with this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Transitioned from Breastmilk
reviews.reviewText: Started to give this formula to my 10 month old after no other formula being introduced. She loved it. No fussiness or gas pains. Extremely convenient container with scoop and holder. The price is excellent. Will buy more once comes back in stock.
